import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { IRootState } from '../../store/store/store' import "./CartPopUp.css" const CartPopUp: React.FC = ()=> { const dishesInCart = useSelector((state: IRootState) => state.order.value); const restToOrder = useSelector((state: IRootState) => state.restaurants.value.find((rest) => rest.id === dishesInCart[0].restaurantId )); const [totalPrice, setTotalPrice] = setState() return (

YOUR ORDER

{restToOrder?.name}

{dishesInCart.map((dish)=> { return
{dish.quantity}

{dish.name}

{dish.totalPrice}

{dish.info && dish.info.map((info) =>

{info}

)}

{dish.price}

})}

Add A Comment

) } export default CartPopUp function setState(): [any, any] { throw new Error('Function not implemented.') }
